cc.factorie.variable

RealVar

trait RealVar extends VectorVar with ScalarVar

An abstract variable with Tensor value which holds a single real (Double) value. Unlike a DoubleValue, these can be used in DotFamilyWithStatistics because its value is a Tensor.

Linear Supertypes
ScalarVar, VectorVar, TensorVar, Var, AnyRef, Any
Known Subclasses
LabeledRealVar, LabeledRealVariable, MutableRealVar, RealTargetVariable, RealVariable, UserReliabilityVariable
